text: Kitty Carstairs is a 1917 novel by the British writer John Joy Bell. It was adapted into a 1928 American silent film Beyond London Lights starring Adrienne Dore.Goble p.688 ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. Category:1917 British novels Category:Novels set in London Category:British novels adapted into films
title: Kitty Carstairs
